testsuite.test:
clipboardString Does it return the copied stirng
Instructions: Copy 'THIS HERE' into the clipboard (without the apostrophes) using the phone's copy-functionality, then press 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

widgetEngineName Verify that it is not an empty string
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

widgetEngineName Verify content
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the above value correct?

widgetEngineProvider Verify that it is not an empty string
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

widgetEngineProvider Verify content
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the above value correct?

widgetEngineVersion Verify that it is not an empty string
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

widgetEngineVersion Verify content
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the above value correct?

vibrate 1s
Instructions: Click 'GO', then the phone should vibrate for 1s.
Expected behaviour: Did the phone vibrate for 1s?

vibrate 10s
Instructions: Click 'GO', then the phone should vibrate for 10s.
Expected behaviour: Did the phone vibrate for 10s?
